scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.default: git add . && git commit -m 'pushed index, gitignore, readme and package files' && git push
scripts.services: git add services && git commit -m 'finished pushing code from services folder' && git push
scripts.config: git add config && git commit -m 'finished pushing code from config folder' && git push
scripts.models: git add models && git commit -m 'finished pushing code from models folder' && git push
scripts.routes: git add routes && git commit -m 'finished pushing code from routes folder' && git push
